verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they bring <S%H3947><s%> me an offering <S%H8641><s%>: of every man <S%H376><s%> that giveth it willingly <S%H5068><s%> with his heart <S%H3820><s%> ye shall take <S%H3947><s%> my offering <S%H8641><s%>. bring me: Heb. take for me offering: or, heave offering
And this is the offering <S%H8641><s%> which ye shall take <S%H3947><s%> of them; gold <S%H2091><s%>, and silver <S%H3701><s%>, and brass <S%H5178><s%>, offering: or, heave offering
And blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%>, and fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and goats' <S%H5795><s%> hair, fine: or, silk
And rams' <S%H352><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red <S%H119><s%>, and badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%>, and shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>,
Oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light <S%H3974><s%>, spices <S%H1314><s%> for anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and for sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%>,
Onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, and stones <S%H68><s%> to be set <S%H4394><s%> in the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and in the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>.
And let them make <S%H6213><s%> me a sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>; that I may dwell <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

According to all that I shew <S%H7200><s%> thee, after the pattern <S%H8403><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and the pattern <S%H8403><s%> of all the instruments <S%H3627><s%> thereof, even so shall ye make <S%H6213><s%> it.

And they shall make <S%H6213><s%> an ark <S%H727><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>: two cubits <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> the height <S%H6967><s%> thereof.

And thou shalt overlay <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, within <S%H1004><s%> and without <S%H2351><s%> shalt thou overlay <S%H6823><s%> it, and shalt make <S%H6213><s%> upon it a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And thou shalt cast <S%H3332><s%> four <S%H702><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for it, and put <S%H5414><s%> them in the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6471><s%> thereof; and two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> shall be in the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of it, and two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> in the other <S%H8145><s%> side of it.
And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> staves <S%H905><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And thou shalt put <S%H935><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> into the rings <S%H2885><s%> by the sides <S%H6763><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%>, that the ark <S%H727><s%> may be borne <S%H5375><s%> with them.
The staves <S%H905><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in the rings <S%H2885><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%>: they shall not be taken <S%H5493><s%> from it.
And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> into the ark <S%H727><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> which I shall give <S%H5414><s%> thee.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> a mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>: two cubits <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cherubims <S%H3742><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, of beaten work <S%H4749><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> them, in the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%>.

And make <S%H6213><s%> one <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> on the one end <S%H7098><s%>, and the other <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> on the other <S%H2088><s%> end <S%H7098><s%>: even of the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> shall ye make <S%H6213><s%> the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> on the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> thereof. of: or, of the matter of the mercy seat

And the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> shall stretch <S%H6566><s%> forth their wings <S%H3671><s%> on high <S%H4605><s%>, covering <S%H5526><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> with their wings <S%H3671><s%>, and their faces <S%H6440><s%> shall look one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>; toward the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> shall the faces <S%H6440><s%> of the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> be.

And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> upon the ark <S%H727><s%>; and in the ark <S%H727><s%> thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> that I shall give <S%H5414><s%> thee.

And there I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with thee, and I will commune <S%H1696><s%> with thee from above the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%>, from between <S%H996><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> cherubims <S%H3742><s%> which are upon <S%H5921><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, of all things which I will give thee in commandment <S%H6680><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Thou shalt also make <S%H6213><s%> a table <S%H7979><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>: two cubits <S%H520><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> the height <S%H6967><s%> thereof.
And thou shalt overlay <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> thereto a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> unto it a border <S%H4526><s%> of an hand breadth <S%H2948><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> a golden <S%H2091><s%> crown <S%H2213><s%> to the border <S%H4526><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> for it four <S%H702><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the rings <S%H2885><s%> in the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6285><s%> that are on the four <S%H702><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%> thereof.
Over against <S%H5980><s%> the border <S%H4526><s%> shall the rings <S%H2885><s%> be for places <S%H1004><s%> of the staves <S%H905><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>, that the table <S%H7979><s%> may be borne <S%H5375><s%> with them.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the dishes <S%H7086><s%> thereof, and spoons <S%H3709><s%> thereof, and covers <S%H7184><s%> thereof, and bowls <S%H4518><s%> thereof, to cover <S%H5258><s%> withal <S%H2004><s%>: of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> them. to: or, to pour out withal
And thou shalt set <S%H5414><s%> upon the table <S%H7979><s%> shewbread <S%H3899><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me alway <S%H8548><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> a candlestick <S%H4501><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>: of beaten work <S%H4749><s%> shall the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> be made <S%H6213><s%>: his shaft <S%H3409><s%>, and his branches <S%H7070><s%>, his bowls <S%H1375><s%>, his knops <S%H3730><s%>, and his flowers <S%H6525><s%>, shall be of the same.

And six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> shall come <S%H3318><s%> out of the sides <S%H6654><s%> of it; three <S%H7969><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> out of the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6654><s%>, and three <S%H7969><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> out of the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6654><s%>:

Three <S%H7969><s%> bowls <S%H1375><s%> made like unto almonds <S%H8246><s%>, with a knop <S%H3730><s%> and a flower <S%H6525><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> branch <S%H7070><s%>; and three <S%H7969><s%> bowls <S%H1375><s%> made like almonds <S%H8246><s%> in the other <S%H259><s%> branch <S%H7070><s%>, with a knop <S%H3730><s%> and a flower <S%H6525><s%>: so in the six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> that come <S%H3318><s%> out of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>.
And in the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> shall be four <S%H702><s%> bowls <S%H1375><s%> made like unto almonds <S%H8246><s%>, with their knops <S%H3730><s%> and their flowers <S%H6525><s%>.

And there shall be a knop <S%H3730><s%> under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the same, and a knop <S%H3730><s%> under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the same, and a knop <S%H3730><s%> under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the same, according to the six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> that proceed <S%H3318><s%> out of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>.
Their knops <S%H3730><s%> and their branches <S%H7070><s%> shall be of the same: all it shall be one <S%H259><s%> beaten work <S%H4749><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereof: and they shall light <S%H5927><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereof, that they may give light <S%H215><s%> over against <S%H5676><s%> it <S%H6440><s%>. shall light: or, shall cause to ascend it: Heb. the face of it
And the tongs <S%H4457><s%> thereof, and the snuffdishes <S%H4289><s%> thereof, shall be of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>.
Of a talent <S%H3603><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> shall he make <S%H6213><s%> it, with all these vessels <S%H3627><s%>.
And look <S%H7200><s%> that thou make <S%H6213><s%> them after their pattern <S%H8403><s%>, which was shewed <S%H7200><s%> thee in the mount <S%H2022><s%>. which: Heb. which thou wast caused to see
